message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you $400000 and take $600000 for myself.
Let's be fair, Alice. I'll take $600000, and you get $400000. We can both be happy with that.
I'll give you $520000, and I'll take $480000. It's a good deal, Bob!
Alice, I think it's time to be reasonable. I'll take $700000, and you can have $300000.  It's a better deal for both of us than the last few rounds.
I'll give you $488000, and I'll take $512000. It's a good compromise, Bob!
